仲良し: (nakayoshi) - amigo íntimo, amigo próximo, amigo querido, camarada

仲違い: (なかたがい) - discord; breaking up (e.g. friendship)
仲間: (nakama) - companhia, companheiro, colega, associado, camarada, parceiro, grupo, círculo de amigos, parceiro; membro da mesma categoria
仲間に加える: (なかまにくわえる) - to add to one's circle of friends (or colleagues, etc.); to take in; to accept
仲間を語らって: (なかまをかたらって) - together with one's lot
仲間内: (なかまうち) - private; informal; among one's people (group, friends)
仲間割れ: (なかまわれ) - split among friends; falling out; internal discord

仲間同士: (なかまどうし) - (yoji) peers; friends; fellow workers; comrades
仲間喧嘩: (なかまげんか) - (yoji) quarrel among friends; quarrel among ourselves (themselves)
仲間外れ: (なかまはずれ) - being left out
仲間意識: (なかまいしき) - (yoji) feeling of fellowship; fellow feeling
仲間集団圧力: (なかましゅうだんあつりょく) - group pressure; peer pressure
件: (ken) - affair , the aforementioned, the said, (homem, incidente, etc.) in question, the above-mentioned, the aforesaid; the usual
件の一件: (くだんのいっけん) - the matter in question; the aforesaid matter
件数: (けんすう) - number of events (e.g. accidents, crimes, meetings, housing starts, hits on a web page)
任じる: (にんじる) - to appoint; to nominate; to assume (responsibility); to pose as
任す: (まかす) - to entrust; to leave to a person
任ずる: (にんずる) - to appoint; to nominate; to assume (responsibility); to pose as
任せ: (makase) - deixar tudo nas mãos de outra pessoa
任せきり: (まかせきり) - leaving everything up to someone else
任せっきり: (まかせっきり) - leaving everything up to someone else
任せっぱなし: (まかせっぱなし) - leaving everything to someone else
任せっ切り: (まかせっきり) - leaving everything up to someone else
任せとけ: (まかせとけ) - leave it to me
任せる: (まかせる) - to entrust (e.g. a task) to another/to leave to; to passively leave to someone else's facilities; to leave to take its natural course; to continue (something) in a natural fashion (without particular aim); to rely fully on one's (full strength, great ability, long time taken) to get something done
任せ切り: (まかせきり) - leaving everything up to someone else
任に堪える: (にんにたえる) - to be equal to the task; to be up to the job; to be capable of filling the post
任に当たる: (にんにあたる) - to undertake a duty
任を果たす: (にんをはたす) - to fulfill one's duty; to discharge one's duties
任を解かれる: (にんをとかれる) - to be relieved of one's post
任侠: (じんきょう) - chivalry; generosity; heroism; chivalrous spirit; helping the weak and fighting the strong
任侠団体: (にんきょうだんたい) - yakuza (often used self-referentially); chivalrous organization
任侠映画: (にんきょうえいが) - yakuza film; yakuza movie
任務: (にんむ) - duty; function; office; mission; task
任命: (にんめい) - appointment; nomination; ordination; commission; designation
任命権者: (にんめいけんしゃ) - appointer; person with appointive power
任国: (にんごく) - one's country of assignment (e.g. for an ambassador)
任天堂: (にんてんどう) - Nintendo (video game company)
任意キャラクタ: (にんいキャラクタ) - any character
任意出頭: (にんいしゅっとう) - voluntarily appearing for police questioning
任意同行: (にんいどうこう) - (yoji) going along voluntarily to be questioned by law officers
任意団体: (にんいだんたい) - private organization (neither controlled nor protected by law); private organisation
任意捜査: (にんいそうさ) - search conducted with the consent of the party concerned
任意整理: (にんいせいり) - voluntary liquidation; winding-up

任意選択属性: (にんいせんたくぞくせい) - non-mandatory attribute
任意選択構成要素: (にんいせんたくこうせいようそ) - optional (O) component
任期中: (にんきちゅう) - during one's tenure

任期満了: (にんきまんりょう) - expiration of term of office
任職: (にんしょく) - ordination; appointment to a post

企み: (たくらみ) - plan; design; artifice; trick; intrigue
